content: indulge in the joy of creating your own buco kitchen towel with this easy-to-follow crochet pattern perfect for adding a touch of handmade charm to your kitchen this pattern is ideal for crocheters of all skill levels the buco kitchen towel features a delightful striped design and textured stitches creating a functional and stylish addition to your home worked flat from the bottom up this pattern includes written instructions and a video tutorial for added support crafted with soft and durable cotton yarn this towel is both practical and beautiful **unique features-** easy-to-follow crochet pattern suitable for all skill levels striped and textured design for added visual interest made with soft and durable cotton yarn for practicality and comfort worked flat from the bottom up with written instructions and video tutorial perfect for adding a handmade touch to your kitchen decor **materials needed-** yarn 380-390 yards of big twist cotton aran weight hook 4mm us size 6 0 gauge 16 stitches by 14 row = 4 inches in pattern
